steps.name: When the user provides valid credentials to sign in
Then User should click in sigin button
When User will click on cart button
Then User Will Clear the Cart
When the user enters canvasPad product in the search bar
Then Click on search button to see the list of products
Then the user clicks on the product canvasPad from list
When User should click on add to cart button
When User Should be click on view cart button

steps.name: When User will select ship to me as the shipping method
Then User should verify that the 15% discount is applied on the product
When User should click on checkout button
When User will click on payment and order review button
When User will add the Card Details like Name on Card,Card Number,Expiration Date,CVV
When User will click on Place order button
When User will redirected to Order Confirmation Page
When User should find Order confirmation with order number
